Directions: Combine all ingredients in a large kettle; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 1-3/4 hours or until mixture reaches desired thickness. Pour hot mixture into hot jars, leaving 1/4-in. headspace. Adjust caps. Process in a boiling-water bath for 15 minutes.
Ingredients: 6 jalapeno peppers, seeded and finely chopped*
